akka.event.japi

Class ActorEventBus<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.event.japi.ActorEventBus<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventBus<E,ActorRef,ActorRef>
    Deprecated. 
    Use ManagedActorEventBus instead. Since 2.4.

    public abstract class ActorEventBus<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventBus<E,ActorRef,ActorRef>
    Java API: See documentation for ActorClassification An EventBus where the Subscribers are ActorRefs and the Classifier is ActorRef Means that ActorRefs "listen" to other ActorRefs E is the Event type
